Backend Engineer

Build robust server-side applications

Become a skilled backend engineer capable of building scalable, secure, and performant server-side applications. This roadmap covers everything from RESTful API design to microservices architecture, with hands-on projects using modern technologies.

4-5 months
15-20 hours/week
19,780 students
★★★★ 4.8 (3,420 reviews)
$299 $449 Save 33%

What You'll Learn

Design and build RESTful and GraphQL APIs

Implement authentication and authorization

Work with SQL and NoSQL databases

Deploy microservices with Docker

Optimize backend performance

Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about the Backend Engineer learning path

How long does it take to complete the Backend Engineer roadmap?

The estimated duration is shown in the roadmap details, but you can learn at your own pace. Most learners complete it within the suggested timeframe by dedicating 15-20 hours per week. However, you have lifetime access and can take as long as you need.

What if I get stuck or need help?

You'll have access to our vibrant community forum where you can ask questions, share progress, and get help from instructors and fellow learners. We also offer weekly office hours and code review sessions.

Do I need prior experience?

Each roadmap clearly lists prerequisites. We design our learning paths to be accessible, with beginner-friendly explanations and gradual progression. If you meet the basic prerequisites, you're ready to start!

What kind of projects will I build?

You'll work on real-world projects that simulate actual industry scenarios. Each project is designed to reinforce concepts and build your portfolio. Projects range from individual exercises to comprehensive applications.

Will I receive a certificate?

Yes! Upon successful completion of all phases and projects, you'll receive a NextWork certificate of completion that you can add to your LinkedIn profile and resume.

Is this course updated regularly?

Absolutely. We continuously update our content to reflect the latest industry practices, tools, and technologies. You'll always have access to the most current version of the roadmap.

Can I download the course materials?

Yes, you can download course resources, code examples, and reference materials for offline learning. Video content is available for streaming through our platform.

What's your refund policy?

We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with the course for any reason, simply request a refund within 30 days of purchase and we'll process it immediately, no questions asked.

Still have questions?

Our team is here to help. Reach out and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
